question: small bump in white mouth?
question_content: ok so i just noticed this about three days ago i have to small white bumps on my mouth inside it on the lower left side and they hurt it makes it hard to eat a most things i dont know why there there but they sting when i touch them i dont see anything on the internet about them and it hurts if a open my mouth too wide they hurt like hell please help

answers.answer_content: Don't worry about it. It's probably just a canker sore, they are usually made by eating a lot of salt or acids. I know a lot of people who have had them. Usually they go away on their own. If it's there for over a week, you may want to go to the doctor just to make sure it is nothing serious. Most likely no big deal though. (:
